content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Steam Power Generation (x=-9.5 y=-0.5 to x=1.5 y=7.5)
Generates electricity using steam power. The boiler is currently out of fuel and the steam engine is not connected to the power network.
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore Pump at Position(x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
- Boiler at Position(x=-4.5, y=3.0) (Status: NO_FUEL)
- Steam Engine at Position(x=1.5, y=7.5) (Status: NOT_CONNECTED)
- PipeGroup connecting pump to boiler (fluid: water) at Position(x=-8.5, y=-0.5)
- PipeGroup connecting boiler to steam engine (fluid: None) at Position(x=-4.5, y=4.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Transport (x=27.5 y=82.5 to x=53.5 y=90.5)
Mines Iron Ore and transports it via
